name: 19.9v

body.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w0))

|- wb(wex(s0, w0), w0)
-| wi(w0, wex(s0, w0))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Version of ~ 19.9 with a disjoint variable condition, requiring fewer axioms. Any formula can be existentially quantified using a variable which it does not contain. See also ~ 19.3v . (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.) Remove dependency on ~ ax-7 . (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Dec-2017.)
